onedrivebusiness_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to the OneDrive team folder ${folder} in ${node}
onedrivebusiness_file_removed: ${user} removed ${path} in the OneDrive team folder ${folder} in ${node}
onedrivebusiness_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${path} in the OneDrive team folder ${folder} in ${node}
onedrivebusiness_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in the OneDrive team folder ${folder} in ${node}
onedrivebusiness_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the OneDrive for Office365 addon for ${node}
onedrivebusiness_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the OneDrive for Office365 addon for ${node}
onedrivebusiness_node_deauthorized_no_us: OneDrive for Office365 addon for ${node} deauthorized
